column8:
This t-shirt design is in admiration of Roger Foster's 'Gherkin' 30 St Mary Axe building.

The Gherkin, also known as St Mary Axe or the Swiss Re Building. It was originally meant to be 386 metres tall (imagine that!), but this plan was scrapped after objections and a smaller 180 metre tower was accepted.

Finished in December 2003 it gained its name from its unorthodox appearance, but it is a great piece of architecture and beautiful to look at!

Buy our Gherkin t-shirt and show your admiration for a London icon.
column21:

It was originally meant to be 386 metres tall (imagine that!), but this plan was scrapped after objections and a smaller 180 metre tower was accepted. Finished in December 2003 it gained its name from its unorthodox appearance, but it is a great piece of architecture and beautiful to look at!

A special t shirt from weadmire.net.
